plot: Roadsworth: Crossing the Line details a Montreal stencil artist's clandestine campaign to make his mark on the city streets. As he is prosecuted at home and celebrated abroad, Roadsworth struggles to defend his work, define himself as an artist and address difficult questions about art and freedom of expression.   Written by  Loaded Pictures
title: Roadsworth: Crossing the Line
plot_es: Roadsworth: Crossing the Line details a Montreal stencil artist's clandestine campaign to make his mark on the city streets.
